title: Game-Based Learning Design for Solving 21st-Century Social Issues

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation environment where social issues are experienced in game format to strengthen collaborative problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social conflict scenarios in VR-based game environments and derive creative solutions
Learners can record and evaluate critical thinking processes at least three times using in-game feedback systems
Learners can apply 21st-century competencies (collaboration, communication, digital literacy) with over 80% performance proficiency through team-based simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
